title: Designing Lifelong Learning Development Strategies for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic adult education theories and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: A professional development course for pre-/in-service teachers to apply lifelong learning concepts in language education settings, utilizing qualitative research methods and expert collaboration frameworks.

learning_goals: Learners can design lifelong learning development models that integrate organizational (individual/institutional) goals.
Learners can conduct learner needs analysis using qualitative research methods (epistemic interviews).
Learners can develop language education programs that reflect the interconnection between personal growth and organizational development.

resources: Lifelong learning development case study materials
Collaboration Tools (Online Whiteboard, Document Sharing System)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
